summary: TypeScript SDK client sends versioning override data in a format incompatible with Temporal Server 1.28.0+, which expects either the new v0.32 structure with pinned override behavior or the deprecated v0.31 structure, but not both mixed together. This causes workflow startup to fail with a validation error.
userImpact: Users cannot start workflows with pinned worker versioning overrides on Temporal Server 1.28.0 or later using TypeScript SDK 1.12+.
rootCause: TypeScript SDK sends versioning override data combining both v0.31 and v0.32 API structures simultaneously, while server 1.28.0+ validates and prefers the v0.32 structure exclusively, rejecting the mixed format.
keyQuote: This fails validation, as the server prefers validation of the v0.32 structure over the deprecated v0.31 structure.
